person.persName: Champ Ferguson (Clinton County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (C.S.A.))

body.p: Clinton County, Kentucky, farmer and guerrilla. Cumberland County, Kentucky, native. Son of William R. Ferguson and Zilpha Huff Ferguson. Married to Ann Eliza Smith Ferguson in 1843. Father of [unknown] Ferguson. Married to Martha Owens Ferguson on July 23, 1848. Father of Ann Elizabeth Ferguson. Farmer in Clinton County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860. Served in an independent guerrilla company of cavalry (C.S.A.) as commander. Found guilty of 53 counts of murder by a U.S. military commission in September 1865. Executed on October 20, 1865, in Nashville, Tennessee.
